Articles.Content:
I did a couple quickie orbital flights to get into orbit and get a few more parts, and with a couple successful returns under my belt, I sent Jeb to the Mun. So few parts. No batteries. No solar panels. No asparagus.

Flawless launch, flawless landing. Had to redo the return a couple times because of fuel (i did quicksave that because it was so tight) but got the mission back and got more than 200 science points.

So fun!

Love it.

nice to see you having fun with 0.22

I cant play it because my dad is currently in America and I am not allowed to download it. D:
